AR.name: Mario vs Donkey Kong™
AR.description: Original Release Date: May 2004 Donkey Kong™ just made off with all the Mini-Mario toys, and now it's up to Mario™ to chase his long-time nemesis and retrieve the stolen goods. Leap and battle through increasingly difficult levels as you use switches, conveyor belts, hammers, and more to overcome the hordes of enemies that block your way. You need brawn...and brains! Figure out the best path, then break out new Mario moves like the handstand to track down keys, collect gifts, and navigate perilous platforms across barrels of levels. Before battling Donkey Kong at the end of each world, collect all the Mini-Marios and lead them to safety!

BR.name: Mario vs Donkey Kong™
BR.description: Data do lançamento original: maio de 2004 Donkey Kong™ acabou de fugir com todos os brinquedos Mini-Mario, e agora é a vez do Mario™ perseguir o seu oponente de muito tempo e recuperar as mercadorias roubadas. Salte e lute em níveis cada vez mais difíceis, enquanto você usa interruptores, esteiras, martelos e muito mais para dominar a multidão de inimigos que tentam impedir o seu avanço. Você precisa de força... e inteligência! Descubra os melhores caminhos, e depois use os seus melhores truques como a parada de mãos, para pegar as chaves, colecionar caixas de presentes, e navegar por plataformas perigosas cheias de barris. Antes de lutar contra Donkey Kong ao final de cada mundo, junte todos os Mini-Marios e os guie em segurança!

PE.name: Mario vs Donkey Kong™
PE.description: Fecha de lanzamiento original: mayo de 2004 Donkey Kong™ acaba de llevarse todos los juguetes Mini Mario y depende de Mario™ rastrear a su archienemigo y recuperar los objetos robados. Para vencer a las hordas enemigas que se interpondrán en tu camino, salta y lucha a través de niveles que serán cada vez más difíciles, mientras accionas interruptores, usas bandas transportadoras, martillos y mucho más. ¡Vas a necesitar fuerza e inteligencia! Descubre el mejor camino a seguir, usa las nuevas habilidades de Mario como por ejemplo, el pararse de manos para rastrear llaves, recolectar regalos y surcar peligrosas plataformas a través de distintos niveles. Antes de luchar contra Donkey Kong al final de cada mundo, ¡recolecta a todos los Mini Mario y ponlos a resguardo!

UY.description: Original Release Date: May 2004 Donkey Kong™ just made off with all the Mini-Mario toys, and now it's up to Mario™ to chase his long-time nemesis and retrieve the stolen goods. Leap and battle through increasingly difficult levels as you use switches, conveyor belts, hammers, and more to overcome the hordes of enemies that block your way. You need brawn...and brains! Figure out the best path, then break out new Mario moves like the handstand to track down keys, collect gifts, and navigate perilous platforms across barrels of levels. Before battling Donkey Kong at the end of each world, collect all the Mini-Marios and lead them to safety!

VG.name: Mario vs Donkey Kong™
VG.description: Original Release Date: May 2004 Donkey Kong™ just made off with all the Mini-Mario toys, and now it's up to Mario™ to chase his long-time nemesis and retrieve the stolen goods. Leap and battle through increasingly difficult levels as you use switches, conveyor belts, hammers, and more to overcome the hordes of enemies that block your way. You need brawn...and brains! Figure out the best path, then break out new Mario moves like the handstand to track down keys, collect gifts, and navigate perilous platforms across barrels of levels. Before battling Donkey Kong at the end of each world, collect all the Mini-Marios and lead them to safety!

PA.name: Mario vs Donkey Kong™
PA.description: Fecha de lanzamiento original: mayo de 2004 Donkey Kong™ acaba de llevarse todos los juguetes Mini Mario y depende de Mario™ rastrear a su archienemigo y recuperar los objetos robados. Para vencer a las hordas enemigas que se interpondrán en tu camino, salta y lucha a través de niveles que serán cada vez más difíciles, mientras accionas interruptores, usas bandas transportadoras, martillos y mucho más. ¡Vas a necesitar fuerza e inteligencia! Descubre el mejor camino a seguir, usa las nuevas habilidades de Mario como por ejemplo, el pararse de manos para rastrear llaves, recolectar regalos y surcar peligrosas plataformas a través de distintos niveles. Antes de luchar contra Donkey Kong al final de cada mundo, ¡recolecta a todos los Mini Mario y ponlos a resguardo!
